message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "PSU and select defensives outperformed while broader indices were range-bound. Banks were mixed (private mid-tier stronger than PSU), NBFCs showed momentum (LTF), pharma/healthcare (LAURUS, MANKIND) strengthened late-week, while IT was sideways. Metals/capital goods were choppy; energy/renewables consolidated.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "sell",
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "shares": 20,
      "amount": 1834.40,
      "reason": "Weak relative strength and lower highs/lows through the week; rotate capital from lagging PSU bank into stronger momentum names."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "shares": 30,
      "amount": 7987.80,
      "reason": "NBFC momentum intact; higher highs Wed–Thu and holding 264–266 support. Favor follow-through with defined risk."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "BEL",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 4128.00,
      "reason": "PSU defense leader with steady uptrend and strong relative strength; reclaimed 410 zone and closed firm."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "shares": 3,
      "amount": 2700.15,
      "reason": "Pharma showing late-week strength; stock reclaimed 900 with improving momentum."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "RBLBANK",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 2995.00,
      "reason": "Adds to winner; persistent momentum from Mon close 290 to Fri 299.5 with healthy volumes."
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 2256.95,
    "total_value": 25548.50,
    "holdings_count": 5,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units",
      "RBLBANK: 20 units",
      "BEL: 10 units",
      "LTF: 30 units",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "+0.3%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove GMRAIRPORT: duplicate/alias of GMRINFRA in list; keep GMRINFRA to avoid duplication",
    "Remove IDEA: sub-₹10, very high volatility; outside risk parameters",
    "Remove RAJESHEXPO: thin liquidity and inconsistent momentum",
    "Remove VSTIND: low liquidity vs peers; limited momentum",
    "Remove RATNAMANI: lower liquidity; focus on higher-volume metals/cap goods",
    "Remove BIRLACORPN: lower liquidity; overlap with stronger cement names (AMBUJA, RAMCO)"
  ]
}
